message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period. This information would typically be found in the income statement as the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS), which represents the cost of inventory items that were sold during the period.

Looking at the income statement in the provided financial data:

```
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 4680000.00 | 2024-01-29 |
```

The Cost of Goods Sold is explicitly listed as 4,680,000.00. This represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period ending on 2024-01-29.

{"solution": {'value': '4680000.00'} }
